title: Champion of Hestia
name: Flarachne - Champion of Hestia
printed_effect:
You can Disenchant {fire} from your Hestia to Search
your deck for an Arachne’s Lair and add it to your
hand. During each End Phase an opponent must
Expend {omni} equal to the number of Elestrals on
their field if Arachne’s Lair is Enchanted.
effect: You can Disenchant {fire} from your Hestia to Search your deck for an Arachne's Lair and add it to your hand. During each End Phase an opponent must Expend {omni} equal to the number of Elestrals on their field if Arachne's Lair is Enchanted.
